markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Crushing Coils](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2377)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 191 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made from constrictor snakeskin, the strips of this _+1 [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_ wrap around you like an anaconda might wrap around its victim. The first time you roll a 1 on any attack roll or check after donning the armor, it fuses with you and constricts. It constricts anytime you roll a 1 on any attack roll or check thereafter. When the armor constricts, you're [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) for 1 round.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** The armor wraps around you, allowing you to don it by the time the activation finishes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Crushing Coils
